@Junko's Disciple: Because people don't know their tags. Kinda like memes, except there isn't a site dedicated to knowing what's up. I used to comment on the KonoSuba doujinshi tagged "Aqua|Azura" about the inaccuracy of that tag, but I gave up. It doesn't really matter that much, in the long run... Although, people who despise Netorare tend to avoid works tagged as such (go figure) without a second thought, so there can be significant consequences of mistaken tagging, in some cases.
Why is there a NTR tag this is not even NTR. I've read some good NTR that made me want to kill myself AND THIS IS A DISGRACE TO NTR!!!!!!!!

This isn't really NTR. The story is just set in an alternate dimension, or something along the lines, where the guild members are all shotas like a lot of people have mentioned already. Technically, that little boy at the end is the Lucian of this world, and I assume at this stage they're not going out yet so she's not really cheating on anyone.
I think they are just genderbent guild members, because one of them is her man. So I don't really consider this NTR.

This isn't actually Netorare; rather, it's an alternate setting in which all three "Alley Cats" guild members besides Ako are shotas. If you look at the three's respective hair color, there's a blonde, a light brunette, and a dark-haired boy involved. Not exactly my ideal setting for a doujin based on this series, but it isn't really bad either.
